mem_term_percent.name: memory terminate percent
mem_term_percent.description: Terminate the process when the remaining memory reaches this percentage.
mem_term_percent.description[zh_CN]: 剩余内存达到该百分比时触发终止进程动作。

mem_kill_percent.name: memory kill percent
mem_kill_percent.description: Kill the process when the remaining memory reaches this percentage.
mem_kill_percent.description[zh_CN]: 剩余内存达到该百分比时触发杀死进程动作。

swap_term_percent.name: swap terminate percent
swap_term_percent.description: Terminate the process when the remaining swap reaches this percentage.
swap_term_percent.description[zh_CN]: 剩余交换内存达到该百分比时触发终止进程动作。

swap_kill_percent.name: swap kill percent
swap_kill_percent.description: Kill the process when the remaining swap reaches this percentage.
swap_kill_percent.description[zh_CN]: 剩余交换内存达到该百分比时触发杀死进程动作。

kill_process_group.name: kill process group
kill_process_group.description[zh_CN]: 杀死该进程所在组内的所有进程。

ignore_root_user.name: ignore root user
ignore_root_user.description[zh_CN]: 忽略 root 用户进程。

prefer_regex.name: prefer regex
prefer_regex.description: prefer to kill processes matching REGEX
prefer_regex.description[zh_CN]: 优先终止进程正则表达式。

avoid_regex.name: avoid regex
avoid_regex.description[zh_CN]: 避免终止进程正则表达式。

ignore_regex.name: ignore regex
ignore_regex.description[zh_CN]: 忽略终止进程正则表达式。
